duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare specimens for laboratory testing and screening.
Obtain blood specimens by performing venipuncture and finger sticks.
Verify test requisitions by comparing information with physician orders.
Alter or adjust methods and procedures for different patient age groups.
Notify relevant personnel if unable to obtain a specimen in a timely manner.
Interact professionally with clinical laboratory personnel and other relevant departments.
Maintain specimen quality by following department set standards and practices.
Assist in training new employees using standardized orientation materials.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required. Prior phlebotomy or medical experience preferred.
BLS required within 6 months of hire.
